title: Noise
content:
You carry a weight, one that accentuates your soul‚Äôs volatility. You shout, but the weight stays the same. You struggle, scream, rant, warn, threaten, question, rebel, justify‚Äîand yet, nothing changes. 

Time? 
What about it?
The greens, blues, and purples will envelop you once more. Light will return, with darkness. It brings peace, quiets your soul. 

No more frantic voices shouting, berating you.

 the ocean‚Äôs waves sweep  the sand away from the shore. Vigorously, against the calm shore. The wind hustles silently. The mosaic finally makes sense. It was all worth it.

Follow at 
@ceruleanocean1 for more on twitter and threads
